Wisdom: الْمَوَدَّةُ تَعَاطُفُ الْقُلُوبِ فِي [و] ائْتِلَافِ الْأَرْوَاحِ
enWisdom: Friendship is the [mutual] empathy of the hearts and the harmony of the souls
Brothers are eliminators of grief and sorrow

Wisdom: إِذَا نَبَتَ الْوُدُّ وَجَبَ التَّرَافُدُ وَالتَّعَاضُدُ
enWisdom: When friendship gets established then [mutual] co-operation and support becomes necessary

[Even] if you have gained confidence and trust in your close friend, safeguard some of your affairs and conceal some of your secrets [from him], for it is possible that you may regret [revealing them] at some time [in the future]

Wisdom: قُلُوبُ الرِّجَالِ وَحْشِيَّةٌ فَمَنْ [ممن‏] تَأَلَّفَهَا أَقْبَلَتْ عَلَيْهِ
enWisdom: The hearts of men are wild, so whoever shows them affection [and tames them], they turn towards him
One who is amiable towards people is loved by them

Wisdom: مَنِ اسْتَصْلَحَ عَدُوَّهُ زَادَ فِي عَدَدِهِ
enWisdom: One who reforms [and reconciles with] his enemy increases in his number
